name: Englisch macht Spass
description: Englisch macht Spaﬂ teaches German speakers English through a journey in London. The player is guided by the dog Thomas and an English friend Spikey. The player can feed Spikey, dress him, teach him words and even paint pictures. The game supports input through the microphone as well as the stylus for thirteen mini-games focused on writing, pronouncing and spelling new English words. The game also includes voice samples, hands-on examples and an integrated notebook and feedback system.
